name: Sunfire Crystal
description: A brilliant orange-red crystal that seems to contain captured sunlight. It pulses with warm energy and feels pleasantly hot to the touch. Ancient runes are etched into its surface, glowing faintly with inner fire. When held up to light, it projects dancing flame patterns on nearby surfaces.

properties.fire_resistance: provides protection from heat and flame
properties.light_source: illuminates darkness with warm golden light

use_description: You hold the Sunfire Crystal aloft and feel its warm energy flow through you, protecting you from the harsh desert heat and illuminating your path with golden light.
